title: Hacktoberfest 2025 Kickoff Night
description: Join Django Cameroon as we kick off Hacktoberfest 2025 with lightning talks, contribution stations, and a live DJ.

title: Open Source Safari: Django Sprint
description: A full day of pair-programming focused on triaging Django issues and reviewing Hacktoberfest pull requests.

title: Community Project Showcase
description: Celebrate the contributions from the month with lightning demos and swag for standout contributors.

title: Hacktoberfest satellite session #Hyderabad
description: Explore DigitalOcean OS Hackathon with Gradient AI, in association with MLH, Okta and AMD. Hackathon, contests, prizes and more!

title: DjangoCon Cameroon 2025
description: The annual DjangoCon Cameroon conference, featuring talks, workshops, and networking opportunities for Django enthusiasts.

title: Angular Cameroon Hacktoberfest Collaboration Day
description: Join Angular Cameroon and Django Cameroon for a day of cross-community collaboration! Contribute to open-source projects, attend lightning talks, and learn from experienced mentors.

title: DevFest Bamenda 2025
description: DevFest Bamenda is GDG Bamenda’s biggest annual tech event, part of the global Google Developer Groups festival. It brings together developers, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts for two days of talks, workshops, code labs, and networking. The 2025 theme is “Building Safe, Secure and Scalable Solutions with AI and Cloud.”

title: AI & Django Hackathon
description: A full-day hackathon for AI and Django enthusiasts. Open to all skill levels to collaborate, learn, and network. Mentorship and lightning talks included.
